name: Fantasy Pong (Healing Digital, Pondinator, Zinker321, Nobi1Kenobi)
name_original: Fantasy Pong (Healing Digital, Pondinator, Zinker321, Nobi1Kenobi)
description:
It's Pong ... but with Abilities.

CSGO --> Valorant

PUBG --> Apex

Classic Pong --> Fantasy Pong!!!

Controls:

Mouse - Navigate Menus

W/S - Move Player 1 Paddle

Space - Activate Player 1 Ability

Up/Down arrow keys - Move Player 2 Paddle

Right Ctrl - Activate Player 2 Ability

Credits:

Design + Development by Pondinator, Nobi1Kenobi, Zinker321

Character Art by Nobi1Kenobi

Background Music by joshuaempyre
